description:
AJKI-07 EMBROIDERED TWILL 3 PC

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Self Twill Trouser: Self Twill Shawl: Self Twill Color: Rust

Wrap yourself in the embrace of rustic charm enveloped in warm tones. This rust-colored shirt, a testament to timeless elegance is heavily embroidered with a luxurious blend of green, peach, and rust hues, accented by delicate light gold sequins, this piece radiates warmth. The matching shawl, crafted in a deeper shade of rust and featuring scalloped embroidery, adds an exquisite touch, echoing the serene beauty of a winter sunset in Kashmir.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front center panel on self twill
Embroidered front side panel left 1 on self twill
Embroidered front side panel right 1 on self twill
Embroidered front side panel left 2 on self twill
Embroidered front side panel right 2 on self twill
Embroidered back center panel on self twill
Embroidered back side panel left 1 on self twill
Embroidered back side panel right 1 on self twill
Embroidered back side panel left 2 on self twill
Embroidered back side panel right 2 on self twill
2.5-meter embroidered border for front & back daman on self twill
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on self twill
2.5-meter embroidered border for front & back chaak on organza
2.5-meter embroidered shawl with 4-side border on self twill
4 embroidered bunches for corners of shawl on self twill
1.5-meter wide-width self twill for trouser
